head.title: Fran Aragón | Frontend Developer
head.description: Fran Aragón, Frontend Developer specialized in React, TypeScript, and web design. Passionate about building intuitive interfaces and innovative digital solutions for agile, high-performance environments.
head.keywords: frontend developer, web designer, react, typescript, frontend, web design, user interfaces, UX/UI, web programmer, frontend development

cookies.message: We use analytical cookies to improve the user experience and analyze site traffic. We do not store personal data. You can accept or reject their use.

cookiesPolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiesPolicy.intro: This website uses analytical cookies to understand how users interact with the site, using tools such as Google Analytics and Search Console.
cookiesPolicy.whatAreCookies: Cookies are small files stored on your device to improve your experience on the website.
typesList: Analytical cookies: Allow us to collect anonymous data about site usage to improve performance and user experience.
cookiesPolicy.manageText: You can accept or reject analytical cookies via the banner or through your browser settings.
cookiesPolicy.personalDataTextPart1: We do not collect or store personal data through cookies or forms on this site.
cookiesPolicy.changesText: We may update this policy occasionally. Please review this page to stay informed.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: This website does not store personal user data. We only use external tools like Google Analytics and Search Console to analyze metrics and improve the experience.

sections.title: 1. Personal data
sections.text: We do not collect or store personal data through this website.

sections.title: 2. Analytical tools
sections.text: We use Google Analytics and Search Console to measure site traffic and behavior, always respecting user privacy through data anonymization.

sections.title: 3. Contact
sections.text: If you want to contact me, you can do so by email. We do not store your information or track you.

sections.title: 4. Rights
sections.text: Since we do not store personal data, requests for access, correction, or deletion do not apply.

sections.title: 5. Policy changes
sections.text: We may update this policy at any time. We recommend reviewing it periodically.

adidas.title: Software Developer
adidas.point1: Worked in the Innovation team, contributing to digital solutions that supported adidas’s product creation workflows and internal applications for managing athlete data.
adidas.point2: Contributed to the Carry Over & Color Up Tool (COCU), focusing on building a scalable frontend and collaborating on the UI with business stakeholders.
adidas.point3: Built modern web apps with JavaScript, TypeScript, and ReactJS, prioritizing maintainability and performance.
adidas.point4: Developed internal applications from scratch with React & Vite, supporting both initial design and implementation.
adidas.point5: Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams (design, backend, business units) to ensure product success and continuous development.
adidas.point6: Applied best practices in testing (Jest, React Testing Library), accessibility, and responsive design.

cei.title: Fullstack Development & Web Design Instructor
cei.point1: Taught Web Design (HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, JavaScript) and Fullstack Development (JavaScript, PHP, MySQL).
cei.point2: Designed practical exercises and projects focused on real-world scenarios, plus individual mentoring to support job readiness.

gransliving.title: Frontend Developer · Web Designer
gransliving.point1: Migrated the company’s WordPress site to a modern React.js application with Next.js, improving performance and scalability.
gransliving.point2: Designed and implemented the new UI with Figma in collaboration with the team; optimized responsive UX to current UI/UX standards.

solutia.title: Frontend Developer
solutia.point1: Driving the frontend of internal and client-facing web products using React and TypeScript, co-owning UI/UX decisions, and ensuring consistency across components, interaction patterns, and implementation quality.
solutia.point2: Responsible for component architecture, design alignment, performance optimisation, and seamless integration with backend services.
solutia.point3: Collaborating closely with developers, designers, and stakeholders to deliver scalable, maintainable, and user-focused interfaces with a strong focus on performance and accessibility.

business-template.description: Modern and elegant template for businesses, agencies, or freelancers, with a professional hero video and smooth animations.

restaurant-template.title: Restaurant Template
restaurant-template.description: Stylish restaurant website template featuring a dynamic hero video, menu sections, and an elegant, responsive design.

about.title: About Me
about.description:
I'm Fran Aragón, a software developer specialized in frontend.

Until September 2025 I worked at adidas in the Innovation team, where I built digital solutions focused on performance and scalability, as well as internal applications for athlete data management.

In my personal projects I use modern tools like React, TypeScript, Next.js, and Tailwind.

I'm passionate about designing, building, and optimizing web experiences with a strong focus on best practices, performance, and accessibility.
